title: Rito please
body: So after getting the newest patch I qued up for ranked like any other player would do. Everything was going fine until it was the last persons turn for picking and the timer went to 0. I thought he was just ask since it said in the chat that everyone left then room. After around 2 seconds I got a disconnected from pvp.net pop up and I was put in the main page and thought "What ever ill just watch the ryze champion spotlight". A little over halfway through I get ANOTHER pop up stating I was afk and had 5 games of lower priority que. Im a little pissed about getting qued for a game I couldnt even get in. Is this a common problem or am I just an unlucky player and is there anything i can do or do i just have to play 5 game where i wait 20 minuets just to get in.

replies.body: It sounds like an unstable connection is causing you to disconnect or lose sync with the game server.  In this case, it looks like the match had a successful /remake, but your account was marked as a leaver.  I highly recommend troubleshooting with our[ Connection Issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)guide to resolve the connection issue you're experiencing and prevent further occurrences.
Thanks my dude. And yeah it was a /remake if you were still wondering. Thanks again for helping c:
